A Clustering Experiment: First Step Towards a Computer-Generated Classification Scheme .A Price, Nancy Schminovich, Samuel A document collection consisting of 240 articles on theoretical high energy physics is analyzed by an empirical clustering procedure, in which bibliographic coupling, obtained by computer, is used to measure the relatedness of articles.. Meaningful groups of documents were produced.. The clustering process ia adapted to future use in the computer-generation of a classification scheme.. .X 26	1	485 29	1	485 39	5	485 45	1	485 50	2	485 61	1	485 67	1	485 68	1	485 69	1	485 70	1	485 71	1	485 72	1	485 73	1	485 135	1	485 172	1	485 174	2	485 175	2	485 191	1	485 194	1	485 206	1	485 207	1	485 208	1	485 212	1	485 261	1	485 274	1	485 310	1	485 326	1	485 346	1	485 382	3	485 417	1	485 419	1	485 422	1	485 446	2	485 454	1	485 458	3	485 473	2	485 476	1	485 477	1	485 478	1	485 479	4	485 480	1	485 481	1	485 483	2	485 484	1	485 485	12	485 488	1	485 503	3	485 562	1	485 564	2	485 566	1	485 570	1	485 572	2	485 577	1	485 579	1	485 615	1	485 616	1	485 632	1	485 640	1	485 660	1	485 661	2	485 662	2	485 663	2	485 664	1	485 680	1	485 704	1	485 769	2	485 773	1	485 779	1	485 780	1	485 781	1	485 893	1	485 902	1	485 958	1	485 981	1	485 982	1	485 1033	1	485 1084	1	485 1118	1	485 1123	1	485 1144	1	485 1161	1	485 1175	1	485 1176	1	485 1207	3	485 1277	1	485 1279	1	485 1283	1	485 1327	2	485 1358	1	485 1387	1	485 1402	1	485 1405	1	485 1410	1	485 1417	1	485 1419	1	485 1426	1	485 1426	1	485
